1576 SWEET HOME RD SUITE 209

citations.narrative:
During inspection, the medical records pertaining to sheep used in September of 2024 were unavailable for inspection as
they were stored off-site. Inability to furnish records at the time of inspection may compromise the ability of inspectors to
assure investigator compliance with IACUC-approved protocols and relevant Animal Welfare Act regulations. The facility
must assure all records relating directly to IACUC-approved activities are available for inspection at reasonable times.
Correct by March 5, 2025.
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.35(f) 
   
Recordkeeping requirements. 
During inspection, the medical records pertaining to sheep used in September of 2024 were unavailable for inspection as 
they were stored off-site. Inability to furnish records at the time of inspection may compromise the ability of inspectors to 
assure investigator compliance with IACUC-approved protocols and relevant Animal Welfare Act regulations. The facility 
must assure all records relating directly to IACUC-approved activities are available for inspection at reasonable times.  
 
Correct by March 5, 2025. 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with a facility representative.
